title: 5 Short Romance Stories Collection #1
description: Do you want to feel a good atmosphere of love, warm feelings, and romantic places? Then, read these five short romance stories collection for adults.This easy-to-read, even for the elderly, 5 short stories collection with short paragraphs, clean or sweet, some instalove and feel-good atmosphere of each standalone will bring you amazing feelings and dreams:Proposal at the PondA Mermaid and the ManJulia and MountainsMeeting in ParisAt the ExhibitionA paperback edition was created as large print books for seniors.The first review of this collection:5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet, clean and fun to read!"Each of these stories are sweet romance. They are short, with some being longer than others. I enjoyed each one and hope you have more people to read these stories." - reviewed by an Amazon customer in the US on March 8, 2023
author: Misha Quinn
